sentences.en: ...silk and satin in every shade of the rainbow.
sentences.cn: …如彩虹般五颜六色的丝绸与锦缎。

sentences.en: A bright rainbow arched above after the rain.
sentences.cn: 雨后彩虹在天上形成弓状.
一弯明亮的彩虹悬挂在天空.

sentences.en: A rainbow arced gracefully over the town.
sentences.cn: 彩虹在小城上空画出了一道优美的弧线。

sentences.en: A rainbow rose against the dark sky.
sentences.cn: 昏黑的天空中出现一道彩虹.

sentences.en: all the colours of the rainbow
At sight of the rainbow , the children were more glad than the parents.
sentences.cn: 看见彩虹, 孩子们比大人更高兴.

sentences.en: I would rather be honest with people than tell them that there is going to be some pot of gold at the end of the rainbow.
sentences.cn: 我宁肯实话实说也不愿意给予他们不切实际的期望。

sentences.en: In the rainbow one color melts into another.
sentences.cn: 在虹中一种颜色逐渐混入另一种颜色.

sentences.en: Round about , piles of lime - stone glistened in all the colours of the rainbow.
sentences.cn: 周围一堆堆的石灰石,在彩虹一样的斑斓色彩中闪闪发光.

sentences.en: The moon was casting a rainbow through the spray from the waterfall.
sentences.cn: 月亮在瀑布溅起的水雾上照出了一道彩虹。

sentences.en: The prism broke the light into all the colors of the rainbow.
sentences.cn: 棱镜把光分解成虹的各种色彩.

sentences.en: The rainbow described an arc in the dark sky.
sentences.cn: 彩虹在昏暗的天空划出了一道圆弧.

sentences.en: The Rainbow has not hosted live music since the end of 1981.
sentences.cn: 1981年末之后，彩虹剧院就再没主办过现场音乐会。

words.tran_cn: [气象]彩虹；五彩缤纷的排列；幻想

phrases.phrase: at the end of the rainbow
phrases.tran_cn: 在可望而不可即的地方
做白日梦，幻想，追寻彩虹
虹桥（美国犹他州南部天然拱形石桥）

trans.tran_en: a large curve of different colours that can appear in the sky when there is both sun and rain

trans.tran_cn: 使呈彩虹状；如彩虹般装饰
